Text: Hmm, I wonder why there is mention of "Malestrom" in the title.
I've got this file from a friend, and that's how it was named... Malestrom....

Ok, I asked because Malestrom is a regular poster here.

See: http://thepiratebay.org/user/malestrom_hh

So it was a bit weird...

For what it is worth, some members such as "Malestrom" post consistently worthwhile material.  As such, other members like myself will search by the members name as a keyword to quickly locate their torrents.  Adding their "name" in the filename makes it a breeze to locate any new torrents, etc.
